response.overview: Oxygen-Jeev Gudmartoy is a 2008 Marathi family drama starring Sayaji Shinde, Makrand Anaspure, Chinmay Mandalekar, Mohan Joshi, Kamlesh Sawant, Sandip Pathak and Charushila Sable. This is the story of Sharvari who fights for her honour. She feels suffocated post her marriage as her father-in-law wants to sexually exploit her. She wants to avenge the dishonour and prove her love and chastity to her husband, Sameer. The character of Sharvari tranforms into a self-empowered woman, from a bubbly little girl.
response.title: Oxygen Jeev Gudmartoy
